scripts.examples: mocha github-*mocha*.js github*jasmine*.js -R spec; node github-with-buster.js
scripts.examples-ff: CHAUFFEUR_BROWSER=firefox mocha github-*mocha*.js github*jasmine*.js -R spec; CHAUFFEUR_BROWSER=firefox node github-with-buster.js
scripts.examples-chrome: CHAUFFEUR_BROWSER=chrome mocha github-*mocha*.js github*jasmine*.js -R spec; CHAUFFEUR_BROWSER=chrome node github-with-buster.js
scripts.examples-all: npm run examples && npm run examples-ff && npm run examples-chrome
